Container.Name: FFmpeg-mkvdts2ac3
Container.Overview: A Docker container designed to watch a directory and encode media files.
Container.Description: A Docker container designed to watch a directory and encode media files.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/watch[/b] : set this path to the watch folder[br] [b]/output[/b] : set this path to output folder[br] [b]/copy[/b] : set this path to folder where you wish that original files are copied[br] [b]$output_format[/b] : set new file format for your encoded file[br] [b]$parameters[/b] : define parameters for ffmpeg[br] ### FFmpeg (-e script='encode.sh')[br] Parameters if ffmpeg is used are defined like this: [br] ffmpeg -i input_dir/file.avi \[br] file.`$output_format` \[br] `$parameters`[br][br] Parameters need to be seperated by ; as delimiter.[br] Example: -map 0;-vcodec copy;-scodec copy;-acodec ac3;-b:a 640k[br][br] ### mkvdts2ac3 (-e script='mkvdts2ac3.sh')[br] Parameters if mkvdts2ac3 is used are defined like this:[br] mkvdts2ac3.sh $mkvdts2ac3_params[br][br] Parameters need to be seperated by ; as delimiter.[br] Example: --compress none;-d;-n;-w /output;--new[br]
